text: Ray Richardson (born 9 September 1959) is an English former professional footballer. Born in London, he played in the Netherlands for Heracles, AZ, Cambuur, Heerenveen and RKC Waalwijk. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Heracles Almelo players Category:AZ Alkmaar players Category:SC Cambuur players Category:SC Heerenveen players Category:RKC Waalwijk players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Eredivisie players Category:English expatriate footballers Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:Association football defenders
title: Ray Richardson (footballer)
